title: Harry Lee (footballer, born 1887)
text:
Henry Lee was an English professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="Forward%20%28association%20football%29">forward</a> who played in the <a href="Football%20League">Football League</a> for <a href="Fulham%20F.C.">Fulham</a>.
Personal life.
Lee worked at <a href="Dick%2C%20Kerr%20%26amp%3B%20Co.">Dick, Kerr & Co.</a> in <a href="Preston%2C%20Lancashire">Preston</a> during the <a href="First%20World%20War">First World War</a>.
